info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 1:40AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ITAWAMBA...SOUTHEASTERN LEE AND NORTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CST... At 140 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evergreen, or 9 miles southeast of Tombigbee State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Amory, Fulton, Tombigbee State Park, Shannon, Plantersville, Mantachie, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Evergreen, Clay, Nettleton, Hatley, Abney, Eastman, Turon, Mooreville, and Eggville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
